title: How old is this bottle of Limca?
selftext: Drank this last night and now I’ve realised it looks incredibly old
comments: The bottle might be old, but it does say the expiry date of 2024 on the label in Italian.
Ah I see can’t believe I missed that good to know I’m not going to die or anything was a very tasty drink!

light_cleaned_title: How old is this bottle of Limca?
light_cleaned_selftext: Drank this last night and now I’ve realised it looks incredibly old
light_cleaned_comments: The bottle might be old, but it does say the expiry date of 2024 on the label in Italian. Glass bottle. Hence reusable. Ah I see can’t believe I missed that good to know I’m not going to die or anything was a very tasty drink!
